attributes.comment:
Adoptive parents already are incurring extra cost by having to submit a 2nd
application for adopting an orphan due to the timeline that China currently is
creating (ie 15 plus months and expiring fingerprints). It would really be a poor
choice to raise the fees for these parents, especially considering they are involved
in a truly humanitarian effort. I would hope that the USCIS would change their
proposal and not raise the fees for adoptive parents who have already done their
fingerprinting, etc 1x...in fact I sincerely wish the USCIS could expedite and
LOWER the fees for adoptive parents 2nd "trip" through this costly process.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Lisa A. Mertens
